title: Completed PE Summary - Patsy B
raw_html:

Port of registry: Fraserburgh
Flag: UK
Type: Fish catching
Built: 1984
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 11.41

Location of incident: Scottish coastal waters
Incident Type: Grounding
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 fatality
Damage/ Pollution: Details

Synopsis

Single handed skipper killed in net drum.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has made recommendations to the vessel's owner with reference to:

  • Risk assessments

  • Use of machinery safety devices
